content: Do we know how often highfive bot misses the r? commands? E.g. https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/83572 was stalled for ages because it didn't reassign me.
if you mean https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/83572#pullrequestreview-622786079, that's because it's a review comment, IIRC bors only checks the normal comments
I think r? is handled by high-five, but I can accept that as an explanation regardless, I guess. Thanks.
